name: Dutiful Bulldozer
description:
This is an epic Work Vehicle game that will give you hours of fun. Load your machine into the mountains and Take a ride to the summit. Rev the throttle and drop the clutch with Full speed on this Up Hill adventure.
The roar of your engine could cause a rock slide So drive carefully.
Features
Many challenging levels
Race against the clock
Amazing stunts
Simple gameplay.
Superb soundtrack.
